lyrics.text:
’Oku ui ‘a e ‘Eiki
‘I he’ene ‘ofa,
Ki he kakai tu’utāmaki
‘I he’enau hia.

Pea ‘oku finangalo
‘A ‘Ene ‘Afio
Ke tafoki kotoa pē
‘A e angahala.

Mo e kau foki ki mui
Pea tō ki lalo
‘Oua na’a mou li’aki
Homou laumālie.

He ‘oku kau ‘a e lea
‘A hotau ‘Otua,
Ki he kakai kuo hinga
‘I he angahala.

‘Oku pehē mai ‘e ia,
Ke mou toe kumi,
He ‘oku ou anga’ofa
Ke mou mo’ui ai.
